Body:
async def task():
    ctx = zmq.asyncio.Context()
    b = await zmq_ipc_pipe_end(ctx, 'b', 'ipc://pipe.ipc')
    assert await b.recv() == 'foo'
    ctx.destroy()
task = asyncio.create_task(task())
ctx = zmq.asyncio.Context()
a = await zmq_ipc_pipe_end(ctx, 'a', 'ipc://pipe.ipc')
await a.send('foo')
ctx.destroy()
await task
pytest.mark.asyncio
